answers.answer: Hello,Viagra helps in maintaining erections and does not treat the cause of erectile dysfunction. For proper erections even after leaving Viagra, you need to treat the cause of erectile dysfunction. The causes are many like diabetes, depression, autonomic nervous system problem, excessive alcohol ingestion or tobacco smoking etc. You may need to consult your doctor to see which amongst these causes are responsible for your problem.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: Will a man of 40 using Viagra for a month will become dependent on it and not able to  have full erection after quitting it?
title: viagra
